original_text:
Superstars
Cosa succede quando i personaggi e le icone delle slot NetEnt più popolari si incontrano in un unico gioco? Questo è ciò che avevano in mente gli sviluppatori quando hanno progettato la sot Superstars a 5 rulli e 45 linee di pagamento fisse. Se vuoi scoprire di più sul gameplay e le funzioni speciali, resta su questa pagina e leggi la recensione completa di Superstars.
Gameplay e scommesse di Superstars
Puoi iniziare subito a girare il layout 5×5 della slot Superstars con 45 payline. La puntata minima che puoi utilizzare per giro è di 0,1€, mentre la più alta è di 100€. L’RTP è del 96,08% e la volatilità è medio-alta. Ciò significa che questo gioco sarà più rischioso rispetto alle slot a volatilità bassa. 
Ma il lato positivo è che, con una volatilità medio-alta, i premi saranno sicuramente meno frequenti, ma anche più elevati, il che è un ottimo punto a favore per coloro che desiderano ricompense più consistenti e non hanno paura di un gameplay più emozionante e rischioso.
Trama, Design e Simboli 
Il tema di Superstars è una vera e propria festa in cui puoi trovare i personaggi delle slot precedenti rilasciate da NetEnt: Gonzo, Finn, gli alieni di Space Wars 2 Powerpoints e Lady Pig di Piggy Riches Megaways. Questo mix rende il crossover davvero fantastico.
Non solo, ma Superstars ha anche alcuni elementi dei giochi di dadi, e durante il Bonus Game il campo di gioco si trasforma nel tabellone, che ricorda il Monopoli, quindi è molto divertente e molto creativo.
Anche i simboli nelle Superstar sono carini: ci sono 10, Jack, Queen, King e Ace,ma anche  Lady Pig, Finn, Brute e Gonzo. C’è anche un altro simbolo regolare: la stella a 8 angoli.
I principali simboli speciali nella slot Superstars sono lo Scatter e il Dado, che oltre ad attivare il Bonus Game, può sostituire i simboli Scatter nel gioco principale.
Bonus e Funzioni Extra della slot gratis Superstars

Bonus Game – Ci sono 2 modi per attivare il gioco Bonus: con i simboli Scatter o con i Dadi. 


Con Scatter: se 3 o più simboli si fermano sui rulli, attivano il Bonus Game e i simboli Scatter che hanno attivato il Bonus Game si trasformano in premi casuali; 
Con il Dado: quando il Bonus Game è attivato, sui rulli possono apparire premi casuali da 1 a 25x moltiplicatori e simboli dei dadi che ti regalano un lancio in omaggio spostando un gettone sul tabellone che nasconde 7 funzionalità speciali (Finn, Gonzo, Miss Banks,Space Wars, Starburst, Extra Spins ed Extra Life).

Ma il divertimento e le sorprese NetEnt non finiscono qui…Ecco gli altri benefit che puoi ottenere durante i tuoi round:

Wheel Game (Gioco della Ruota)

Il gioco della ruota viene attivato quando il gettone si ferma su una casella. In questa funzione, puoi girare la ruota e ottenere una serie di premi e funzioni extra, consultabili nella tabella dei pagamenti della slot;

Funzione Replay

La slot Superstars ha uno speciale ticket Replay che ti permette di riprodurre le funzionalità Starburst, Gonzo, Miss Banks, Space Wars, Finn o Upgrade, indipendentemente dal fatto che siano state attivate dal tabellone o dalla Ruota;

Final Game

Quando tutte le posizioni sui rulli si riempiono di premi, verrà attivata la funzione Gioco Finale. Qui, verranno assegnati premi in tutte le caselle: 25x, 50x, 75x, 100x, 500x o 1.000x puntata, ad eccezione di 2 caselle che assegnano i simboli Dadi quando il gettone si ferma su di esse;

Buy Feature

È anche possibile attivare la funzione Bonus Game tramite l’opzione Acquista funzione per 150 volte la puntata.

Domande Frequenti 
Come posso giocare a Superstar gratuitamente?

Semplicissimo, seleziona uno dei nostri casinò online più votati e cerca Superstars in modalità demo. In seguito, potrai registrarti, creare un nuovo conto gioco e ritirare subito il tuo bonus di benvenuto senza deposito.



Quanto mi costa l'acquisto di bonus nella slot Superstars?

Il Buy Bonus costa 150 volte la tua puntata; il prezzo esatto dipende dall'importo della scommessa.



Qual è la vincita massima che posso raggiungere in Superstars?

Se Lady Luck ti sorride e ti benedice con buona fortuna, allora puoi vincere fino a 4.586 volte la tua puntata attuale. Inoltre, hai una serie di funzionalità che renderanno il gameplay più divertente, e aumenteranno notevolmente le tue possibilità di vittoria. Hai Bonus Buy, Giri Gratuiti, un Wheel Game con premi, simboli speciali, moltiplicatori e molto altro ancora!

raw_translation.response:
Superstars
What happens when the characters and icons from NetEnt's most popular slots come together in one game? This is what the developers had in mind when they designed the 5-reel, 45-fixed-payline slot Superstars. If you want to learn more about the gameplay and special features, stay on this page and read the complete review of Superstars.

Gameplay and Betting in Superstars
You can start spinning the 5x5 layout of the Superstars slot with 45 paylines right away. The minimum bet you can use per spin is 0.1€, while the highest is 100€. The RTP is 96.08% and the volatility is medium-high. This means that this game will be riskier compared to low volatility slots. 

But the positive side is that, with medium-high volatility, prizes will definitely be less frequent, but also higher, which is a great advantage for those who want more consistent rewards and are not afraid of a more exciting and risky gameplay.

Plot, Design and Symbols
The theme of Superstars is a real party where you can find the characters from previous slots released by NetEnt: Gonzo, Finn, the aliens from Space Wars 2 Powerpoints and Lady Pig from Piggy Riches Megaways. This mix makes the crossover truly fantastic.

Not only that, but Superstars also has some elements of dice games, and during the Bonus Game the playing field turns into a board, reminiscent of Monopoly, so it's very fun and creative.

The symbols in Superstars are also cute: there are 10, Jack, Queen, King and Ace, but also Lady Pig, Finn, Brute and Gonzo. There is also another regular symbol: the eight-sided star.

The main special symbols in the Superstars slot are the Scatter and the Dice, which, besides activating the Bonus Game, can replace Scatter symbols in the main game.

Bonus and Extra Features of the Free Superstars Slot

Bonus Game - There are 2 ways to activate the Bonus Game: with Scatter symbols or with Dice.

With Scatter: If 3 or more symbols stop on the reels, they activate the Bonus Game and the Scatter symbols that activated the Bonus Game are transformed into random prizes;

With Dice: when the Bonus Game is activated, random prizes from 1 to 25x multipliers and dice symbols that give you a free roll by moving a token on the board that hides 7 special features (Finn, Gonzo, Miss Banks, Space Wars, Starburst, Extra Spins and Extra Life) can appear on the reels.

But the fun and surprises NetEnt doesn't end here... Here are the other benefits you can get during your rounds:

Wheel Game
The wheel game is activated when the token stops on a square. In this feature, you can spin the wheel and get a series of prizes and extra features, which can be found in the slot's paytable.

Replay Feature
The Superstars slot has a special Replay ticket that allows you to replay the Starburst, Gonzo, Miss Banks, Space Wars, Finn or Upgrade features, regardless of whether they were activated from the board or the Wheel.

Final Game
When all positions on the reels are filled with prizes, the Final Game feature will be activated. Here, prizes will be awarded in all squares: 25x, 50x, 75x, 100x, 500x or 1,000x the bet, except for 2 squares that assign dice symbols when the token stops on them.

Buy Feature
You can also activate the Bonus Game feature through the Buy feature option for 150 times your bet.

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I play Superstar for free?
Very simple, select one of our highest rated online casinos and look for Superstars in demo mode. Then, you can register, create a new gaming account, and withdraw your no deposit welcome bonus right away.

How much does it cost to buy bonuses in the Superstars slot?
The Buy Bonus costs 150 times your bet; the exact price depends on the amount of the bet.

What is the maximum win I can reach in Superstars?
If Lady Luck smiles on you and blesses you with good luck, then you can win up to 4,586 times your current bet. In addition, you have a series of features that will make gameplay more fun and greatly increase your chances of winning. You have Bonus Buy, Free Spins, a Wheel Game with prizes, special symbols, multipliers and much more!

raw_translation.response:
Review of Superstars

Experience the ultimate crossover of characters and icons from NetEnt's most beloved slot games in Superstars. This 5-reel, 45 fixed payline slot is the brainchild of innovative developers who unite our favorite characters in one game. Get ready to learn about the gameplay, special features, and much more in this full review of Superstars.

Gameplay and Betting in Superstars

Start spinning the layout of Superstars, with 45 paylines and a 5x5 format. Bets can range anywhere from €0.1 to €100. The RTP for this game is 96.08%, and the volatility is medium to high. This means that the rewards will be less frequent but more substantial than in low volatility slots. However, those who are not afraid of taking risks will find Superstars exhilarating and rewarding.

Plot, Design, and Symbols

Superstars is a festive, fun-filled game, where legendary characters from previous NetEnt games such as Finn, Alien, Gonzo, and Lady Pig from Piggy Riches Megaways come together to celebrate. The gameplay is further augmented by including elements of dice games, and during the Bonus Game, the game board transforms into a Monopoly-like design, adding an extra layer of creativity and entertainment. The symbols in Superstars are as charming as the characters, with ten, jack, queen, king, ace, Lady Pig, Finn, Brute, Gonzo, and the 8-cornered star creating an unforgettable visual experience.

Bonus and Extra Features in Superstars

Bonus Game–Activate the Bonus Game by landing on three or more scatter symbols or by using the dice.

Scatters: Three or more scatter symbols trigger the Bonus Game. The scatter symbols that activated the game turn into random prizes.
Dice: During the Bonus Game, random bonuses ranging from 1 to 25x multipliers and dice symbols can appear on the reels, allowing you to make a free throw on the board that hides 7 special features–Finn, Gonzo, Miss Banks, Space Wars, Starburst, Extra Spins, and Extra Life.

Two more surprises await you in Superstars:

Wheel Game–When the token lands on a specific box on the board, the Wheel Game activates, giving you access to a range of special features and prizes that can be found in the slot's paytable.

Replay Function–The slot also features a Replay Ticket that lets you replay Starburst, Gonzo, Miss Banks, Space Wars, Finn, or Upgrade regardless of whether you activated these functions via the board or the wheel.

Final Game–When all reel positions become filled with prizes, the Final Game function activates, awarding prizes in all positions but two, providing multipliers ranging from 25x, 50x, 75x, 100x, 500x, and up to 1,000x your bet.

Buy Feature–For 150x your bet, you can buy the Bonus Game and eliminate the wait for additional symbols to land.

FAQs

How can I play Superstars for free?

It's easy. Choose one of our top-rated online casinos and play Superstars in demo mode. Register to create a new gaming account after which you can immediately withdraw your welcome bonus without depositing.

How much does it cost to buy a bonus in Superstars?

The cost of buying a bonus is 150x your bet. The exact price depends on the amount of your bet.

What is the maximum payout in Superstars?

If Lady Luck smiles upon you and good fortune blesses your reels, you can win up to 4,586x your current bet. Plus, you have a host of features that make gameplay more exciting and significantly increase your chances of winning, such as Bonus Buy, Free Spins, a Wheel Game with prizes, special symbols, multipliers, and much more!

This is what the developers had in mind when they designed the 5-reel, 45-fixed-payline slot Superstars. If you want to learn more about the gameplay and special features, stay on this page and read the complete review of Superstars.

Gameplay and Betting in Superstars
You can start spinning the 5x5 layout of the Superstars slot with 45 paylines right away. The minimum bet you can use per spin is 0.1€, while the highest is 100€. The RTP is 96.08% and the volatility is medium-high. This means that this game will be riskier compared to low volatility slots. 

But the positive side is that, with medium-high volatility, prizes will definitely be less frequent, but also higher, which is a great advantage for those who want more consistent rewards and are not afraid of a more exciting and risky gameplay.

Plot, Design and Symbols
The theme of Superstars is a real party where you can find the characters from previous slots released by NetEnt: Gonzo, Finn, the aliens from Space Wars 2 Powerpoints and Lady Pig from Piggy Riches Megaways. This mix makes the crossover truly fantastic.

Not only that, but Superstars also has some elements of dice games, and during the Bonus Game the playing field turns into a board, reminiscent of Monopoly, so it's very fun and creative.

The symbols in Superstars are also cute: there are 10, Jack, Queen, King and Ace, but also Lady Pig, Finn, Brute and Gonzo. There is also another regular symbol: the eight-sided star.

The main special symbols in the Superstars slot are the Scatter and the Dice, which, besides activating the Bonus Game, can replace Scatter symbols in the main game.

Bonus and Extra Features of the Free Superstars Slot

Bonus Game - There are 2 ways to activate the Bonus Game: with Scatter symbols or with Dice.

With Scatter: If 3 or more symbols stop on the reels, they activate the Bonus Game and the Scatter symbols that activated the Bonus Game are transformed into random prizes;

With Dice: when the Bonus Game is activated, random prizes from 1 to 25x multipliers and dice symbols that give you a free roll by moving a token on the board that hides 7 special features (Finn, Gonzo, Miss Banks, Space Wars, Starburst, Extra Spins and Extra Life) can appear on the reels.

But the fun and surprises NetEnt doesn't end here... Here are the other benefits you can get during your rounds:

Wheel Game
The wheel game is activated when the token stops on a square. In this feature, you can spin the wheel and get a series of prizes and extra features, which can be found in the slot's paytable.

Replay Feature
The Superstars slot has a special Replay ticket that allows you to replay the Starburst, Gonzo, Miss Banks, Space Wars, Finn or Upgrade features, regardless of whether they were activated from the board or the Wheel.

Final Game
When all positions on the reels are filled with prizes, the Final Game feature will be activated. Here, prizes will be awarded in all squares: 25x, 50x, 75x, 100x, 500x or 1,000x the bet, except for 2 squares that assign dice symbols when the token stops on them.

Buy Feature
You can also activate the Bonus Game feature through the Buy feature option for 150 times your bet.

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I play Superstar for free?
Very simple, select one of our highest rated online casinos and look for Superstars in demo mode. Then, you can register, create a new gaming account, and withdraw your no deposit welcome bonus right away.

How much does it cost to buy bonuses in the Superstars slot?
The Buy Bonus costs 150 times your bet; the exact price depends on the amount of the bet.

What is the maximum win I can reach in Superstars?
If Lady Luck smiles on you and blesses you with good luck, then you can win up to 4,586 times your current bet. In addition, you have a series of features that will make gameplay more fun and greatly increase your chances of winning. You have Bonus Buy, Free Spins, a Wheel Game with prizes, special symbols, multipliers and much more!
